    #include<bits/stdc++.h>
    double a[2510][2510];
    using namespace std;
    double cal(int t,int k)
    {
    if(t<=0 || k<0 || k>t/2)return 0.0;
    if(t==2*k)return a[t][k]=k;
    if(a[t][k]!=0)return a[t][k];
    double p1 = k/(double)(t-k);
    a[t][k]=0;
    if(k>0)
    a[t][k]+= p1*(1.0+cal(t-2,k-1));
    if(2*k<t)
    {
    double a1 = (1/(double)(t-k-1));
    double b1 = (k/(double)(t-k-1));
    double p = 1-p1;
	double p2 = p*a1;
    double p3= p*b1;
    a[t][k] += p2*(1.0+cal(t-2,k)) + p3*(2.0+cal(t-2,k));
    if(t-2*k-2>0)
    {
    double p4 = (1-p1)*((1-a1-b1));
    a[t][k] += p4*(1.0+cal(t,k+2));
    }
    }
    return a[t][k];
    }
    int main()
    {
    int n,m;
    while(scanf("%d%d",&n,&m)!=EOF)
    {
    //memset(a,0,sizeof(a));
    double ans =cal(n*m,0);
    printf("%.4f\n",ans);
    //cout<<fixed<<setprecision(4)<<ans<<endl;
    }
    }
